page.title: 01Hope_under_Dinmore
page.content: { Hope_under_Dinmore}village is half way between Hereford and Leominster. It lies at the foot of and to the north of Dinmore Hill.Hope villlage is scattered with a{population of 520 people.The scattered{hamlet of Newton just north of Hope has a{population of {68}people.The whole area is{undulating {arable countryside}with plenty of {small deciduous woods}and a few little apple orchards here and there.The area contains{13 farms of various sizes mostly worked by 1 or 2 men.The{River {Lugg flows}from{north}to{south}and is fed by 2 streams from the west.The Marl Brook and the Cherry Brook.A {double track railway line (Hereford to {Shrewsbury)runs south to north as does {the main A49}trunk road.Local industry is Cadburys chocolate factory,Little Chef restaurant,Patricks agricultural contractor,Hampton Green Farm &farming
